00040 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00041 
00042 class Squid extends Model
00043 {
00044     public $Name= 'squid';
00045     public $User= 'root|_squid';
00046     
00047     public $NVPS= '\h';
00048     public $ConfFile = '/etc/squid/squid.conf';
00049     public $LogFile= '/var/squid/logs/access.log';
00050 
00051     public $VersionCmd= '/usr/local/sbin/squid -v';
00052 
00053     public $PidFile= '/var/squid/logs/squid.pid';
00054 
00055     function Squid()
00056     {
00057         global $TmpFile;
00058         
00059         parent::Model();
00060         
00061         $this->StartCmd= "/usr/local/sbin/squid -D > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00062         
00063         $this->Commands= array_merge(
00064             $this->Commands,
00065             array(
00066                 'GetIpPort' => array(
00067                     'argv'  => array(),
00068                     'desc'  => _('Get HTTP proxy IP:port'),
00069                     ),
00070 
00071                 'DelIpPort' => array(
00072                     'argv'  => array(IPPORT),
00073                     'desc'  => _('Delete HTTP proxy IP:port'),
00074                     ),
00075 
00076                 'AddIpPort' => array(
00077                     'argv'  => array(IPPORT),
00078                     'desc'  => _('Add HTTP proxy IP:port'),
00079                     ),
00080                 )
00081             );
00082     }
00083 
00091     function AddIpPort($if)
00092     {
00093         $this->DelIpPort($if);
00094         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->ConfFile, "/(\h*#\h*TAG:\h*https_port.*)/m", "http_port $if\n".'${1}');
00095     }
00096 
00103     function DelIpPort($if)
00104     {
00105         $if= Escape($if, '.');
00106         return $this->ReplaceRegexp($this->ConfFile, "/^(\h*http_port\h*$if\b.*(\s|))/m", '');
00107     }
00108 
00111     function GetIpPort()
00112     {
00113         global $Re_IpPort;
00114 
00115         return $this->SearchFileAll($this->ConfFile, "/^\h*http_port\h*($Re_IpPort)\b.*\h*$/m");
00116     }
00117     
00118     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00119     {
00120         global $Re_Ip;
00121     
00122         //1253140814.385  11463 127.0.0.1 TCP_MISS/200 6796 GET http://openbsd.org/images/cd45-s.gif - DIRECT/199.185.137.3 image/gif
00123         //1251968551.489      0 127.0.0.1 TCP_HIT/302 823 GET http://fxfeeds.mozilla.com/firefox/headlines.xml - NONE/- text/html
00124         $re_datetime= '(\d+\.\d+)';
00125         $re_size= '(\d+)';
00126         $re_clientip= "($Re_Ip|-)";
00127         $re_cache= '(\S+)';
00128         $re_code= '(\d+)';
00129         $re_mtd= '(GET|POST|\S+)';
00130         $re_link= '(\S+)';
00131         $re_direct= '(\S+)';
00132         $re_targetip= "($Re_Ip|\S+|-)";
00133         $re_type= '(\S+)';
00134 
00135         $re= "/^$re_datetime\s+\d+\s+$re_clientip\s+$re_cache\/$re_code\s+$re_size\s+$re_mtd\s+$re_link.*\s+$re_direct\/$re_targetip\s+$re_type$/";
00136         if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00137             $day= sprintf('% 2d', date("j", $match[1]));
00138             $cols['Date']= date("M", $match[1]).' '.$day;
00139             $cols['Time']= date("H:i:s", $match[1]);
00140             $cols['DateTime']= $cols['Date'].' '.$cols['Time'];
00141             $cols['ClientIP']= $match[2];
00142             $cols['Cache']= $match[3];
00143             $cols['Code']= $match[4];
00144             $cols['Size']= $match[5];
00145             $cols['Mtd']= $match[6];
00146             $cols['Link']= $match[7];
00147             $cols['Direct']= $match[8];
00148             $cols['Target']= $match[9];
00149             $cols['Type']= $match[10];
00150             return TRUE;
00151         }
00152         else if ($this->ParseSyslogLine($logline, $cols)) {
00153             $cols['DateTime']= $cols['Date'].' '.$cols['Time'];
00154             return TRUE;
00155         }
00156         return FALSE;
00157     }
00158     
00159     function PostProcessCols(&$cols)
00160     {
00161         preg_match('|http://([^/]*)|', $cols['Link'], $match);
00162         $cols['Link']= $match[1];
00163     }
00164     
00165 }
